price: Àwa ń sọ ìtàn tó dára jùlọ fún ọ pẹ̀lú ohun tí A fi ránṣẹ́ sí ọ (nínú ìmísí) al-Ƙur’ān yìí, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ṣíwájú ìmísí náà ìwọ wà lára àwọn tí kò nímọ̀ (nípa rẹ̀).
arabic: نَحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka aḥsana al-qaṣaṣi bimā awḥaynā ilayka hādhā al-qur'āna wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghāfilīna
